author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: An escalator can never break: it can only become stairs. You should never see an Escalator Temporarily Out Of Order sign, just Escalator Temporarily Stairs. Sorry for the convenience.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I find a duck's opinion of me is very much influenced by whether or not I have bread.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I saw this wino, he was eating grapes. I was like, "Dude, you have to wait".

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I would imagine that if you could understand Morse code, a tap dancer would drive you crazy.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I used to do drugs. I still do drugs. But I used to, too.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Mr. Pibb is a poor imitation of Dr. Pepper. Dude didn't even get his degree.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Is a hippopotamus a hippopotamus or just a really cool opotamus?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'd hate to be a giraffe with a sore throat.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I haven't slept for ten days, because that would be too long.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Every picture of you is when you were younger.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: The depressing thing about tennis is that no matter how good I get, I'll never be as good as a wall.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Rice is great if you're really hungry and want to eat two thousand of something.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My belt holds my pants up, but the belt loops hold my belt up. I don't really know what's happening down there. Who is the real hero?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When I was a boy, I laid in my twin-sized bed and wondered where my brother was.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I don't have a girlfriend. I just know a girl who would get really mad if she heard me say that.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I went to a record store, they said they specialized in hard-to-find records. Nothing was alphabetized!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to get a vending machine, with fun sized candy bars, and the glass in front is a magnifying glass. You'll be mad, but it will be too late.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Wearing a turtleneck is like being strangled by a really weak guy, all day. Wearing a backpack and a turtleneck is like a weak midget trying to bring you down.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you can't sleep, count sheep. Don't count endangered animals. You will run out.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm a heroine addict. I need to have sex with women who have saved someone's life.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm against picketing, but I don't know how to show it.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I don't wear a watch because I want my arms to weigh the same.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I know people who believe in ghosts but don't believe in themselves.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A burrito is a sleeping bag for ground beef.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I tried to throw a yo-yo away. It was impossible.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Sometimes I get really lonely. Especially when I'm throwing a Frisbee.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got my hair highlighted because I felt some strands were more important than others.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: The Kit Kat candy bar has the name Kit Kat imprinted into the chocolate. That robs you of chocolate! That's a clever chocolate-saving technique.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I'm upside down.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Every book is a children's book if the kid can read!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When you put Listerine in your mouth, it hurts. Germs do not go quietly.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I wish I could play little league now. I'd be way better than before.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I am wearing a vest. If I had no arms, it would be a jacket.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When someone hands you a flyer, it's like they're saying here you throw this away.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: They say the recipe for Sprite is lemon and lime. I tried to make it at home. There's more to it than that.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My friend asked me if I wanted a frozen banana. I said 'No, but I want a regular banana later, so... yeah.'

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Fettucini alfredo is macaroni and cheese for adults.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I once saw a forklift lift a crate of forks. And it was way to literal for me.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I think animal crackers make people think that all animals taste the same.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If 13 is unlucky, then 12 and 14 are guilty by association.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: An escalator can never break: it can only become stairs.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I went to the airport, I put my bag in the x-ray machine, I found out my bag has cancer. It only has six more months to hold stuff.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I was in a convenience store, reading a magazine. The clerk told me, "this is not a library!" "OK! I will talk louder, then!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If I had nine of my fingers missing I wouldn't type any slower.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If carrots got you drunk, rabbits would be messed-up.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A waffle is like a pancake with a syrup trap.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm gonna fix that last joke by taking out all the words and adding new ones.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: People teach their dogs to sit; it's a trick. I've been sitting my whole life, and a dog has never looked at me as though he thought I was tricky.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When you go to a bar that has a black light, everybody looks cool. Except for me, because I was under the impression that the mustard stain came out.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn't have one. So I got a cake.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you're watching a parade, don't follow it. It never changes. If the parade is boring, run in the opposite direction. You will fast-forward the parade.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A severed foot is the ultimate stocking stuffer.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: You should never tell someone they have a nice dimple, because maybe they were shot in the face with a BB gun.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Waffles are like pancakes with syrup traps

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Why are there no "during" pictures?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I thought my teeth were white until I washed my face with Noxzema. My teeth are off-white. I'm not even white. I'm off-white. It's a new race; we will prevail!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I did a radio interview; the DJ's first question was "Who are you?" I had to think. Is this guy really deep, or did I drive to the wrong station?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: 2-in-1 is a stupid term, because 1 is not big enough to hold 2. That's why 2 was created.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Here's a thought for sweat shop owners: Air Conditioning. Problem solved.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: XM radio doesn't have commercials, so after about thirty minutes of listening to it, I'm like, "What should I buy?"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I saw a seagull hanging out by a lake, but I said, "Don't worry, Dude. I won't say anything."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I tried to walk into Target, but I missed. I think the entrance to Target should have people splattered all around.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you find yourself lost in the woods, build a house. "Well, I was lost, but now I live here!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I love my fed-ex guy cause he's a drug dealer and he don't even know it...and he's always on time.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: This shirt is "dry-clean only"... Which means it's dirty.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: We don't have to fix anything.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got binoculars 'cause I don't want to go that close.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Swiss Cheese is a rip-off It's the only cheese I can bite into and miss

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When you open the elevator on the top floor of a building and the other guy doesn't get out, something is seriously wrong.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Onions make me sad. A lot of people don't realize that.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Dogs are forever in the push up postion.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I can read minds, but I'm illiterate.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I hate dreaming because when you want to sleep, you want to sleep. Dreaming is work. Next thing you know, I have to build a go-cart with my ex-landlord.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A sleeping bag is a tortilla for a human.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I think foosball is a combination of soccer and shish kabobs.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I played golf... I did not get a hole in one, but I did hit a guy. That's way more satisfying.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I don't have a microwave oven, but I do have a clock that occasionally cooks stuff.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I ate one anchovy, and that is why I did not eat two anchovies.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: P.S. - This is what part of the alphabet would look like if Q and R were eliminated.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to get a job naming kitchen appliances. That seems easy; refrigerator, toaster, blender. You just say what the thing does and add "er".

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Tony the Tiger usually thinks that stuff is great.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I've never been to a hotel with a rotating restaurant on top, but one time I took my girlfriend to a merry-go-round, and I gave her a burrito.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I had the cab driver drive me here backwards, and the dude owed me $27.50.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I wish they made fajita cologne, because that stuff smells good. What's that you're wearing? That's sizzlin'!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to get non-aerosol mace, you just rub it in. "Dude who is attacking me - come a little closer!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I type a 101 words a minute. But it's in my own language.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I recently took up ice sculpting. Last night I made an ice cube. This morning I made 12, I was prolific.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I used to be a hot-tar roofer. Yeah, I remember that... day.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I've got a wallet, it's orange. In case I wanna buy a deer. That doesn't make any sense at all.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I would imagine the inside of a bottle of cleaning fluid is really clean. I would imagine a vodka bottle is really drunk.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to ride in a cold air balloon. "This isn't going anywhere!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I played in a death-metal band. People either loved us or hated us. Or they thought we were OK.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I met this girl, she was an actress, and she gave me her number. It started with 555.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got a king-sized bed. I don't know any kings, but if one came over, I guess he'd be comfortable.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you're a fish and you want to be a fish-stick, you have to have very good posture.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got some tartar-control toothpaste a while back. I've still got tartar, but it's under control.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If I had a dollar for every time I said that, I'd be making money in a very weird way.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I went to a restaurant with my friend, and he said, "Pass the salt." I said, "Screw you! Sit closer to the salt."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Kittens play with yarn, they bat it around. What they're really doing is saying, "I can't knit, get this away from me!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A fly was very close to being called a land, because that's what it does half the time.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I was going to get my teeth whitened, but I said, "I'll just get a tan instead."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: It's hard to dance if you just lost your wallet. Whoa Where's my wallet But, hey this song is funky.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I bought myself a parrot, but it did not say "I'm hungry", and so it died.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm into carpooling, because sometimes my car gets hot and needs to refresh itself.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I went to the store and bought eight apples; the clerk said, "Do you want these in a bag?" I said, "Oh, no, man, I juggle."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I drank some boiling water because I wanted to whistle.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like Kit-Kat, unless I'm with four or more people.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I remixed a remix, it was back to normal.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I bought a seven-dollar pen because I always lose pens and I got sick of not caring.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: It's very dangerous to wave to people you don't know because what if they don't have hands? They'll think you're cocky.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Come on 'long prosperous life!'

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Y'know, you can't please all the people all the time... and last night, all those people were at my show.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: When I was on acid, I would see things like beams of light and I would hear sounds that sounded an awful lot like car horns.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: People ask me for my autograph after a show. I'm not famous, I think they're messing with me. I think they're trying to make me late for something.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like vending machines, because snacks are better when they fall.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like rice. Rice is great if you're hungry and want 2000 of something picketing, but I don't know how to show it.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got an ant farm. Them fellas didn't grow anything. Hey, how about some celery? Plus, if I tore your legs off, you would look like snowmen.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you are flammable and have legs, you are not blocking a fire exit.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I rented a car. I didn't really need one, I just wanted to make one less available. I wanted one businessman on the bus with no car.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Snake eyes is a gambling term, and an animal term, too.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Every time I go and shave, I assume there's someone else on the planet shaving. So I say, 'I'm gonna go shave, too.'

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I used to drink wine. This girl asked me, "Doesn't wine give you a headache?" "Yeah, eventually, but the first and the middle part are amazing!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like to hold the microphone cord like this, I pinch it together, then I let it go, then you hear a whole bunch of jokes at once.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I tried to freshen up a room, so I held a Certs in front of a fan.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I know a lot about cars, man. I can look at any car's headlights and tell you exactly which way it's coming.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Last time I called shotgun we had rented a limo, so I messed up!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I can't wait to get off the stage, because I've got some LifeSavers in my pocket and pineapple is next!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Well, I was lost but now I live here! I have severely improved my predicament!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I hate flossing, I wish I just had one long curvy tooth. They didn't have to make separations for me.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If Spiderman was real, and I was a criminal, and he shot me with his web, I would say, "Dude, thanks for the hammock."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If I was a mechanic and someone called me and said their car would not start, I would say, "Hey - maybe a killer is after you!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I had a paper route when I was a kid. I was supposed to go to 2,000 houses. Or two dumpsters.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got a smoke alarm at home, but really it's more like a 9-volt-battery-slowly-drainer.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Escalator temporarily stairs. Sorry for the convenience.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I had my palm read. I wrote something on it first to see if she would read that too.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Cavities are made by sugar. So if you need to dig a hole, then lay down some candy bars!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I’d like to see a forklift lift a crate of forks. It’d be so damn literal! You are using that machine to it’s exact purpose!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I would like to go fishing and catch a fish stick. That would be convenient. I could easily get a job at Mrs. Paul's.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If my kid couldn't draw I'd make sure that my kitchen magnets didn't work.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you have to release bad news to the public, it would help if you are not ugly.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got a hotel room at New York New York in Las Vegas and I was very happy. They've got that rollercoaster encircling the entire premises, just like Manhattan.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I was booked into the Riviera Hotel in Las Vegas with three other comedians. We all were using the Riviera in-house shampoo, so we all had equal shine and bounce.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm an ice sculptor. Last night I made a cube.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Alcoholism is the only disease that you can get yelled at for having.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Why is Cloud 9 so amazing? What is wrong with Cloud 8? That joke came off the top of my head, and the top of my head ain't funny!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: What am I drinking? NyQuil on the rocks, for when you're feeling sick but sociable.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm a hard act to follow, because when I'm done, I take the microphone with me.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Yeah, I'm not into sports. If someone told me I had athlete's foot, I'd say that's not my foot!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I saw on HBO they were advertising a boxing match "It's a fight to the finish". That's a good place to end.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: People on the 14th floor, you know what floor you’re really on.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I have an idea for sweatshops: air conditioning! That's simple. 14 year old boys working twelve hour days? "Yeah, but they're comfortable!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'd like to get four people who do cart wheels very good, and make a cart.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I can whistle with my fingers, especially if I have a whistle.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I had a chicken finger that was so big, it was a chicken hand.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A lollipop is a cross between hard candy and garbage.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: No, I was just good at holding ice cream cones.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I spilled some vodka on the carpet, and I vacuumed it up, and the vacuum got drunk. I had to take the Hoover to detox.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I miss the $2 bill, 'cause I can break a two. $20, no. $10, no. $5, maybe, $2? Oh yeah. What do you need, a one and another one?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: A snake bite emergency kit is a body bag.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: One time I was forced to go to the doctors because of a sports accident. Herpes.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I read that MTV's Real World got 40,000 applications. That's amazing, such an even number. You would have thought it would be 40,008.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My lucky number is four billion. That doesn't come in real handy when you're gambling. "Come on, four billion! Darn! Seven. Not even close. I need more dice."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: All these jokes have been pre-approved as funny by me.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I think pickles are cucumbers that sold out. They sold their soul to the devil, and the devil is dill.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I think pickles are cucumbers that sold out.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I tried to have a cookie, and this girl said, "I'm mailing those cookies to my friend." So I couldn't have one. You shouldn't make cookies untouchable.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Bologna is a deli meat for people with eyes.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Well, that's a 'fresher'. I'm going on break.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I saw a human pyramid once. It was very unnecessary. It did not need to exist.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Hell, yeah! Meeting adjourned!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm not into sports. I mean...I like Gatorade, but that's as far as it goes.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I don't like grouper fish. Well, they're okay. They hang around star fish. Because they're grouper fish.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I have no problem not listening to the Temptations.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Comedy clubs have brick walls behind the performer. Bricks make you funny. When I'm in front of a fireplace, I'm hilarious.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I have a Sharpie. I love Sharpies. You know what they say on them? Not for letter writing. That sucks. Now I have to communicate with my dad using numbers.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I got two stools, in case I want to sit down and sit down again on something else.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Have you ever tried sugar or PCP?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I hate arrows. They try to tell me which direction to go. It's like "I ain't going that way, line with two thirds of a triangle on the end!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like to smoke a pipe, because it's the punch line indicator. Whenever I take a hit of the pipe, you should be laughing.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I didn't go to college, but if I did, I would've taken all my tests at a restaurant, 'cause 'The customer is always right'.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I wanted to get a tape recorder, but I got a parrot instead. I think I did that joke backwards.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: We're gonna have to sweeten some of these jokes for the CD. You know what sweeten means, right? Sweeten is a show-biz term for "add sugar to".

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I love blackjack. But I'm not addicted to gambling. I'm addicted to sitting in a semi circle.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: The commercial for Diet Dr. Pepper says it tastes just like regular Dr. Pepper. Well, then they screwed up!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you had a friend who was a tightrope walker, and you were walking down a sidewalk, and he fell, that would be completely unacceptable.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My manager said, "Don't use liquor as a crutch!" I can't use liquor as a crutch, because a crutch helps me walk.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My girlfriend works at Hooters. In the kitchen.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: It's weird... people say they're not like apes. Now how do you explain football then?

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I cannot tell you what hotel I'm staying at, but there are two trees involved.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to be a rebellious McDonald's owner. Cheeseburgers... NOPE... we got spaghetti!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you want to talk to me after the show, I'd be surprised.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Then let's print up some flyers!

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I have a "Do Not Disturb" sign on my hotel door. It's time to go to "Don't Disturb". It's been "Do Not" for too long. We should embrace the contraction.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I put fruit on top of my waffles, because I want something to brush off.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm sick of Soup Of The Day, man. It's time we make a decision. I need to know what Soup From Now On is.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I had to take a physical to do this show. They had a lot of weird questions like, "Have you ever tried sugar or PCP?"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: The customer’s always right.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I would like it if four people did a cartwheel all at once... so I can make a cart.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Mitch”, but then reattach it and call it “Mitch-all-together.

quote: I went to a tent store. "What kind of tent do you need?" "Circus."

quote: I got an ant farm; them fellas didn't grow sh*t.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like wearing necklaces, because it lets me know when I'm upside down.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I can't eat spaghetti. There's too many of them.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: Sometimes I fall asleep at night with my clothes on. I'm going to have all my clothes made out of blankets.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My roommate says, "I'm going to take a shower and shave. Does anyone need to use the bathroom?" It's like some weird quiz where he reveals the answer first.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I went to a cigar store, the man behind the counter asked me, "What kind of cigars do you like?" I answered, "It's a Boys."

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I want to make a vending machine that sells vending machines. It'd have to be real big.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I like to wear a "Do Not Disturb" sign around my neck so that little kids can't tell me knock-knock jokes. "Hey, how ya doin'? Knock-knock." "Read the sign, punk!"

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I sometimes close my eyes during a show because I have drawn a picture of an audience enjoying the show more on the back of my eyelids.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I saw a guy juggling chain saws, it was cool, unless something needed to be sawed down, then it's annoying.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: People who smoke cigarettes, they say "You don't know how hard it is to quit smoking." Yes I do. It's as hard as it is to start flossing.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I've always wanted to have a suitcase handcuffed to my wrist. That's not a full joke there! It's filler.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: If you drink O'Douls, you don't drink; but if you drink 20 O'Douls in a half hour, then you're a non-alcoholic.

author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: That would be cool if the earth's crust was made out of graham cracker. It would disappear just like the ozone layer, but for completely different reasons.

quote: It's hard to fight when you're in a gazebo.

quote: Because of acid, I now know that butter is way better than margarine.

quote: Spaghetti... I can't eat spaghetti, there's too many of them. No matter how hungry I am, 1,000 of something is too many. I'll have 1,000 pieces of noodles.
